sent.orig: My army present informationization degree very high army army opened the mystical veil.
sent.trans: 我陆军目前信息化程度很高的蓝军部队揭开神秘面纱。

sent.orig: Our vanward army is red 5 army group and red 9 army.
sent.trans: 我们的先锋部队是红5军团和红9军。

sent.orig: An army without culture is a dull-witted army, and a dull-witted army cannot defeat the enemy.
sent.trans: 没有文化的军队是愚蠢的军队，而愚蠢的军队是不能战胜敌人的。

sent.orig: The army is made of two major components: the Active Duty and Army Reserve.
sent.trans: 该军由两大部分组成：现役人员和预备役人员。

sent.orig: The army cherishes the people and the people support the army.
